property.name: Type

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Neo Evolution: You may put this creature on top of one of your light, water or nature creatures. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ESCAPE (When this creature would be destroyed, you may add one of your shields to your hand instead. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.) ■ When you put this as an evolution creature or when its tapped, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. ■ Each turn, the first time whenever one of your opponent's creatures is tapped, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Neo Evolution:You may put this creature on top of one of your water, darkness or fire creatures. ■ Super Soul Raid (When you put this creature, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may choose one from among them that can be an evolution source for this creature and put it under this creature. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature is destroyed, put any number of creatures from your graveyard they were under it that have total cost 5 or less. Then you may return any number of other cards under it from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Race
property.value: Demon Command/Demon's Legacy/Fusioner

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, destroy up to 2 of your opponent's creatures that have total cost 9 or less. {SUPER SOUL CROSS} (If this is under a creature, that creature also gets the following ability.) ■ When you would lose the game, if this is an evolution creature, you may put all cards under this creature into your graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Neo Evolution: You may put this creature on top of one of your light, fire or nature creatures. ■ Super Soul Raid (When you put this creature, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may choose one from among them that can be an evolution source for this creature and put it under this creature. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.) {POWERED BREAKER} (This creature breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ This creature gets +8000 power for each card under this creature. ■ When you put this creature, you can't be attacked by creatures that have less power than this creature until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add a Neo Creature or Angel Command card from among them to your hand and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. {SUPER SOUL CROSS} (If this is under a creature, that creature also gets the following ability.) ■ Once per turn, when this creature would leave, you may put one of your shields into your hand instead. You can't use the "shield trigger".
